name: Bath & Body Works, Inc.
description: Bath & Body Works, Inc. is a leading specialty retailer known for its wide range of personal care products, fragrances, and home fragrances. Established in 1990 in New Albany, Ohio, the company has become a household name, offering high-quality products that encompass body lotions, shower gels, perfumes, candles, and home fragrance solutions. Bath & Body Works is renowned for its innovative scents and seasonal collections, which resonate with customers looking for unique and luxurious experiences. The brand emphasizes customer engagement through its store experience, providing a welcoming atmosphere for shoppers to explore and discover new products. Bath & Body Works' commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has driven its growth, leading to a significant presence in both physical and online retail spaces. The company operates hundreds of retail locations across the United States and internationally, making its products accessible to a diverse customer base. In recent years, Bath & Body Works has focused on sustainability and ethical sourcing, striving to create products that are not only effective but also environmentally friendly. As part of its ongoing strategy, the company invests in marketing and product innovation to stay ahead in the competitive beauty and personal care market.

seo.meta_title: Bath & Body Works, Inc. | Personal Care and Fragrance Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Bath & Body Works, Inc., a leader in personal care and home fragrance products. Discover innovative scents and seasonal collections that enhance your daily routine.

faq.question: What products does Bath & Body Works offer?
faq.answer: Bath & Body Works offers a variety of personal care products including body lotions, shower gels, perfumes, and scented candles.

faq.question: Where is Bath & Body Works headquartered?
faq.answer: Bath & Body Works is headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: When was Bath & Body Works founded?
faq.answer: Bath & Body Works was founded in 1990.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Bath & Body Works?
faq.answer: Joanne C. Crevoiserat is the CEO of Bath & Body Works, Inc.
